name: io.github.syucream/lightdash-mcp-server
description: A MCP(Model Context Protocol) server that accesses to Lightdash. This server provides MCP-compatible access to Lightdash's API, allowing AI assistants to interact with your Lightdash data through a standardized interface.

tools.name: lightdash_list_projects
tools.description: List all projects in the Lightdash organization

tools.name: lightdash_get_project
tools.description: Get details of a specific project

tools.name: lightdash_list_spaces
tools.description: List all spaces in a project

tools.name: lightdash_list_charts
tools.description: List all charts in a project

tools.name: lightdash_list_dashboards
tools.description: List all dashboards in a project

tools.name: lightdash_get_custom_metrics
tools.description: Get custom metrics for a project

tools.name: lightdash_get_metrics_catalog
tools.description: Get metrics catalog for a project

tools.name: lightdash_get_charts_as_code
tools.description: Get charts as code for a project

tools.name: lightdash_get_dashboards_as_code
tools.description: Get dashboards as code for a project

tools.name: lightdash_get_metadata
tools.description: Get metadata for a specific table in the data catalog

tools.name: lightdash_get_analytics
tools.description: Get analytics for a specific table in the data catalog
